Sentencas: The coupling of biomass gasification and solid oxide cell technologies is very intriguing due to its high efficiency and flexibility potential.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell stack coupled with an oxygen-blown TwoStage gasifier using minimal gas cleaning

Sentencas: One of the key challenges in order to realize such a system design is a clean quality gas that can meet the strict requirements of the SOFC.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell stack coupled with an oxygen-blown TwoStage gasifier using minimal gas cleaning

Sentencas: This study presents the result of an experimental campaign with the TwoStage Viking biomass gasifier and a Topsoe Fuel Cell SOFC stack connected via a carbon filter and a desulphurizer.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell stack coupled with an oxygen-blown TwoStage gasifier using minimal gas cleaning

Sentencas: The stack is operated with both air-and O-2-CO2-blown product gas, at 700 degrees C and 800 degrees C, and tests without any gas cleaning was conducted.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell stack coupled with an oxygen-blown TwoStage gasifier using minimal gas cleaning

Sentencas: The study found electric efficiencies up to 40% at 69% fuel utilization and an 8-11% increase in power when raising the SOFC temperature to 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell stack coupled with an oxygen-blown TwoStage gasifier using minimal gas cleaning

Sentencas: The O-2-CO2-blown product gas showed lower efficiencies due to lower CO performance in the SOFC.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell stack coupled with an oxygen-blown TwoStage gasifier using minimal gas cleaning

Sentencas: A preliminary 2-h test with no gas cleaning between the gasifier and SOFC, and a approximate to 1.5-2.8 ppm sulphur concentration showed no change in operational voltage.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell stack coupled with an oxygen-blown TwoStage gasifier using minimal gas cleaning

Sentencas: Hence the study finds that gasifier design can greatly simplify the demand for gas cleaning equipment.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell stack coupled with an oxygen-blown TwoStage gasifier using minimal gas cleaning
